summary: Stress tests failed to complete in CI with unclear cause. Investigation was blocked by infrastructure limitations but resolved after migrating to GitHub-hosted runners.
userImpact: Unreliable CI stress tests prevent validation of SDK stability and reliability.
rootCause: Infrastructure limitations in the CI runner environment causing test timeouts or incomplete execution.
proposedFix: Migrate to GitHub-hosted runners with better resource availability and stability.
resolutionDetails: Issue resolved by migrating to GitHub-hosted runners which provide more reliable infrastructure.
keyQuote: Closing this as it should not happen anymore now that we have GH hosted runner.
